duties_responsibilities.duty: Support engineering activities and the development and/or maintenance of deliverable tracking and project schedules.
Author and manage equipment and process change control, as needed.
Author and manage engineering, operational, and validation lifecycle documents, as needed.
Coordinate and execute engineering testing and training activities with end users, as needed.
Coordinate validation IQOQPQ activities, as needed.
Manage project closeout and file transfer activities.
Responsible for validation and qualification activities, including testing, documentation authoring, or execution.
Apply technical and functional knowledge to assist in experiment/project design.
Work independently on a broad range of difficult problems and suggest new, innovative solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Chemical/Mechanical/Electrical Engineering or appropriate scientific discipline (Master's preferred)
